title: Brocard's problem
summary: Brocard's problem is a problem in mathematics that seeks integer values of n {\displaystyle n} such that n ! + 1 {\displaystyle n!+1} is a perfect square, where n ! {\displaystyle n!} is the factorial. Only three values of n {\displaystyle n} are known — 4, 5, 7 — and it is not known whether there are any more.
